title: HOUR 1 - Celtics-Heat, Curry, Rivers
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Celtics-Heat, Curry, Rivers
description:
Colin's thoughts on Boston's dominating game 4 win over Miami

The Warriors do a great job hiding Step Curry's flaws

Doc Rivers is a better coach than people think


Guest: Dan Woike
